pageProduct.name: Palmers Skin Success Fade Milk Tone Correcting Body Lotion 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Skin Success Anti-Dark Spot Fade Milk Tone Correcting Body Lotion is fast-absorbing, and visibly improves unwanted dark spots, age spots, post-acne scars and uneven skin tone. Clinically proven to deliver visible results in as little as 2 weeks!* Infused with natural skin brighteners Vitamin C, Japanese Songyi Mushroom Extract to improve radiance and even skin tone. *May take up to 8 weeks. | **Based on a 100 person independent clinical study.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Rather than simply lightening skin like many other products do, Palmer's Skin Success targets areas of hyperpigmentation caused by scars, skin trauma or sun damage and helps return them to the same tone as the rest of the complexion. This means the range is suitable for any skin tone and type, and promotes healthy, youthful and even toned skin.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Niacinamide, Mineral Oil (Parraffinum Liquidum), Cetearyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Myristate, Stearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Ceteareth-20, Tocopherol Acetate, Retinol, Tricholoma Matsutake Extract, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glycyrrhiza Glaba (Licorice) Root Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Xanthan Gum, Lauryl Glucoside, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance (Parfum), Citronellol, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl lonone.

Directions

Apply twice daily on clean, dry skin focusing on more pigment-prone areas such as elbows, knees décolletage.
